snippet: Network television’s first anchorwoman plans to announce Monday that next year she will leave the business where she broke barriers and rules for more than 50 years.
abstract: Barbara Walters, network television’s first anchorwoman, plans to announce that in 2014 she’ll leave the business where she broke barriers and rules for more than 50 years.
lead_paragraph: Network television’s first anchorwoman plans to announce Monday that next year she will leave the business where she broke barriers and rules for more than 50 years.

headline.seo: Barbara Walters to Announce 2014 Retirement on ‘The View’
headline.main: Walters to Announce 2014 Retirement on ‘The View’
headline.print_headline: Walters Set to Announce 2014 Retirement on ‘The View’
